title: 90% Indian tech CEOs will hire at same level or more in 2022, after a year of record hiring: Nasscom sur - Times of India
content: 90% Indian tech CEOs will hire at same level or more in 2022, after a year of record hiring: Nasscom sur  Times of India
description: India Business News: With economic activity picking up in 2022, nearly two- thirds of the CEOs expect digital talent to constitute upto 50% of new hires.
